company.name: 2xNutrition

recommendations.description: Designed to provide a high-calorie intake with a balanced ratio of macronutrients and micronutrients to support muscle growth and weight gain.
A protein-rich supplement to aid muscle recovery and growth, ideal when paired with a calorie-surplus diet.

which_products_should_take_to_gain_weigh.note: Specific product names are inferred; check the 'Collections' or 'Weight Gainers' section on 2xnutrition.com for exact offerings.

recommendations.description: A fat-burning capsule formulated to boost metabolism and support weight loss without side effects.
Supports muscle maintenance while keeping calorie intake low, aiding fat loss in a calorie-deficit diet.

which_products_should_take_to_lose_weigh.note: Verify availability and variants on the 'Weight Loss Supplements' section of 2xnutrition.com.

would_be_any_allergic_reaction.disclaimer: 2X Nutrition does not guarantee the absence of allergic reactions due to individual sensitivities. Ingredients are listed on product pages and packaging.
would_be_any_allergic_reaction.precaution: Customers should review ingredient lists for allergens (e.g., dairy, nuts, gluten) and consult a physician if unsure.
would_be_any_allergic_reaction.action: In case of a reaction, discontinue use and contact support@2xnutrition.com with batch details for investigation.

our_story.summary: Founded by Yatinder Singh, 2X Nutrition emerged from a vision to bridge nutritional gaps with transparent, science-backed supplements. After over two decades in the fitness industry, Singh identified a lack of authenticity in the market and aimed to create trustworthy products that exceed expectations.
our_story.ethos: Embracing science over gimmicks, 2X Nutrition focuses on efficient formulations to deliver real results, breaking stereotypes about synthetic ingredients.
